content.raw:
Ok! I played a bit with the actor.sdf example world and it seems that the way the rotations are combined is not quite what you would expect:

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/1078707865-actor_rotation_louise.gif)
I suspected one of those rotation order issues so I just switched the order of the operations in Line 418 to trajPose \+ globalPose and it seems to fix it.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3956665035-actor_rotation_louise_fixed.gif)
Does that make sense?
